text: Oudsbergen is a municipality in the Belgian province of Limburg. It was created on 1 January 2019 when the municipalities of Opglabbeek and Meeuwen- Gruitrode joined together to become the new municipality of Oudsbergen. The new municipality has an area of and more than 23,000 people. Category:2019 establishments in Belgium Category:Municipalities of Limburg
title: Oudsbergen
